      • payout

        public void payout(Context<?> respCtx,
          Prize prize)
            throws ApplicationException
        从接口复制的说明: PayoutStrategy
        Perform the real payout. This method will update ticket and generate payout log accorindg to the payout mode.
        指定者:
        payout 在接口中 PayoutStrategy
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of transaction.
        prize - The detailed prize information.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException - when encounter any business exception.

      • assemblePayout

        protected void assemblePayout(Context<?> respCtx,
                  Prize prize,
                  PrizeItem prizeItem,
                  Payout payout)
                       throws ApplicationException
        Subimplementation can override this method to assemble Payout entity in its own requirement.
        参数:
        respCtx - The context of transaction.
        prize - The prize information.
        prizeItem - The prize item of given game instance.
        payout - The generated payout base on current prize item.
        抛出:
        ApplicationException
